Record.ClassificationPath: Animal Diseases/Cat Diseases/Feline Acquired Immunodeficiency Syndrome
Virus Diseases/Slow Virus Diseases/Feline Acquired Immunodeficiency Syndrome
Virus Diseases/RNA Virus Infections/Retroviridae Infections/Lentivirus Infections/Feline Acquired Immunodeficiency Syndrome
Record.Description: Acquired defect of cellular immunity that occurs in cats infected with feline immunodeficiency virus (FIV) and in some cats infected with feline leukemia virus (FeLV).
